snippet: Rick Santorum’s campaign is claiming that Mitt Romney will fail to win the 1,144 delegates needed to clinch the Republican nomination.
abstract: Rick Santorum’s campaign is claiming that Mitt Romney will fail to win the 1,144 delegates needed to clinch the Republican nomination.

headline.main: Santorum Says Romney's Delegate Lead Will Fade as the Contest Continues
headline.print_headline: Santorum Says Romney’s Delegate Lead Will Fade as the Contest Continues
